SEARCH

Class Game

java.lang.Object
Game
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Game extends Object implements Serializable
Class for Game, handles the list of questions, points, time and date and user's name
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game()
      Constructor for "Game" object. Takes in no arguments, but calls setTime() and setDate() (for save file purposes) and loads 5 questions from file

    • readNameOfFileObjects

      private ArrayList<Game> readNameOfFileObjects()

      Returns:
      ArrayList with all the games that were on files listed in "ficheirosObjetos.txt"

    • checkFileQuestions

      private boolean checkFileQuestions(String[] content)
      Checks if the question file is legal, and not corrupted
      Parameters:
      content - Array of Strings, each is a line of the question file
      Returns:
      boolean for if the file is legal or not
